title: Bug 6536: Javadoc for fields in Type Hierarchy view not working
description: When trying to add Javadoc on a field in the Type Hierarchy view, the Javadoc does not get added.
OB: After selecting a field in the Type Hierarchy view and attempting to add Javadoc, the Javadoc does not get saved.
EB: The Javadoc should be successfully added and saved for the selected field in the Type Hierarchy view.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the Type Hierarchy view.
2. Select a field in the view.
3. Try to add Javadoc for the selected field.
4. Verify that the Javadoc does not get saved.
